si.title: කැනඩාවේ ආශාව
body_lines: කැනඩාවේ මුදල් වංචා කිරීමේ චෝදනාව මත ශ්රී ලංකා විදේශ රැකියා කාර්යාංශයේ නිලධාරීන් දෙදෙනෙකු අත්අඩංගුවට ගෙන තිබේ.
බොරෙල්ලා ප්රදේශයේ ක්රියාත්මක වන සමාගමකට රුපියල් ලක්ෂ 10 ක් ලැබී ඇති බවට පුද්ගලයෙකු කාර්යාංශයට පැමිණිලි කර තිබේ.
සමාගම විසින් ශ්රී ලංකා කාර්යාංශයේ වලංගු බලපත්රයක් නොමැතිව සිදුකරන නීති විරෝධී විදේශ රැකියා ඒජන්සියක් බව සමාගම අනාවරණය කර තිබේ.
இதனையடுத்து, குறித்த நிறுவன உரிமையாளர் உட்பட மேலும் ஒருவரை புலனாய்வு அதிகாரிகள் கைது செய்துள்ளனர்.
கைது செய்யப்பட்ட சந்தேக நபர்களை நீதிமன்றில் முன்னிலைப்படுத்திய போது, 10 இலட்சம் ரூபாய் பிணையில் விடுவிக்குமாறு உத்தரவிடப்பட்டுள்ளது.

en.title: கனடா ஆசைகூறி மோசடி
body_lines: Officials of the Sri Lanka Foreign Employment Bureau have arrested two persons for allegedly defrauding money in Canada.
A person has lodged a complaint with the Bureau that a company operating in Borella area has received Rs 10 lakh, although he has received Rs.
The company has revealed that the company was an illegal foreign employment agency conducted without a valid permit of the Sri Lanka Bureau.
Subsequently, investigators have arrested another person, including the owner of the company.
When the arrested suspects were presented in court, it was ordered to be released on bail of Rs 10 lakh.

summary_lines: In Canada, officials from Sri Lanka's Foreign Employment Bureau arrested two individuals accused of fraud. A complaint led to the discovery of a Borella-based company, which allegedly received Rs 10 lakh but failed to deliver services legally. The company operated without a permit, leading to the arrest of its owner and another suspect. They were later released on bail of Rs 10 lakh.
